review: Over all ,it was great selection for team of doctors.Great line of treatment with extra care and timely care and taking care that treatment to be completed with in comfort zone without any pain

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was my first visit to the clinic. Dr. Sushma did a thorough check up and explained me about the procedures she will be carrying out.  The RCT went very well and I am more than satisfied with the treatment. I will surely recommend Dr. Sushma from Dr. Teeth clinic to everyone.

Firstly, dr made me comfortable by saying she will treat by my pace, give breaks if i need.she explained all the course of treatment, and agreed to give appointment as per my suitable time . Her skills were noted at every point during the treatment, Thank you dr now I am not having pain , love you!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Great experience would recommend everyone did the treatment really well my gum problem have sloved thankyou for the great experience
Very good experience  n friendly. Very approachable and response is also very instant.  Would recommend  to friends and family.  Constant follow up done by assistant  and can connect to doctor
